title: The World changes: Japan's food from land and sea
creator_credit: Holt, Rinehart and Winston and Hugh Gage
brief_description: Illustrates how Japan’s mountainous land is made productive through terracing, contour farming, chemical fertilizers, crop rotation and research. Also looks at the fishing industry and efficient vegetable handling and marketing practices.
